General.Name: Shenyang Huitian Thermal Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenyang Huitian Thermal Power Co.,Ltd provide heating and heating engineering services for residents and non-residents in China. It also offers thermal engineering program installation services. The company was formerly known as Shenyang Thermal Power Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenyang Huitian Thermal Power Co.,Ltd in January 1997. Shenyang Huitian Thermal Power Co.,Ltd was founded in 1980 and is based in Shenyang, China.
